name: gettalks
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ted_talks_api.
Tool description: Get TED talks based on multiple different parameters and filtering options, from the speaker, topic, talk duration, and more.
API description: Retrieve information about specific TED talks based on the provided parameters.

is_id.description: ID of a desired specific talk.

audio_lang.description: Return talks which their audio language is the provided language. The provided value should be the language slug according to the /audio_languages endpoint.

speaker.description: Return talks which at least one of their speakers is the provided speaker. The provided value should be the speaker slug according to the /speakers endpoint.

publish_date.description: Return talks which were published on TED.com only on the exact provided date.

topic.description: Return talks which at least on of their topics is the provided topics, the provided value should be the speaker slug according to the /topics endpoint

subtitle_lang.description: Return talks which have subtitles in the provided language. The provided value should be the language slug according to the /subtitle_languages endpoint.

max_duration.description: Return talks which their duration in seconds is at most the provided value.

to_publish_date.description: Return talks which were published on TED.com only before the provided date.

from_publish_date.description: Return talks which were published on TED.com only after the provided date.

min_duration.description: Return talks which their duration in seconds is at least the provided value.

record_date.description: Return talks which were recorded only on the exact provided date.

to_record_date.description: Return talks which were recorded only before the provided date.

from_record_date.description: Return talks which were recorded only after the provided date.
